game.name: 遗物路：Relic Road
game.shortDescription: Relic Road is a roguelike turn-based tower-climbing game centered around equipment and relic building. As players continue to explore, they can recruit various heroes to expand their team, obtain equipment from heroes, encounter different events, and strengthen their forces.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Relic Road is a roguelike turn-based tower-climbing game centered around equipment and relic building. As players continue to explore, they can recruit various heroes to expand their team, obtain equipment from heroes, encounter different events, and strengthen their forces.
